intro: Cyrtophyllum minutiflorum, commonly known as the small-flowered cyrtophyllum, is a flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate white flowers that bloom in clusters. It typically grows in moist, shaded forest environments. Its foliage consists of opposite, ovate leaves with a smooth texture.
